sentences.english: This paper aims to study on three questions about Sui Emperor Wen.
sentences.chinese: 本文对隋文帝的三个问题进行深入系统研究。

sentences.english: Traditionally, it is considered that Yang Guang, Emperors son and the crown prince, murdered Emperor Wen.
sentences.chinese: 隋文帝杨坚之死，传统看法是被其子杨广弑杀。

sentences.english: Filial piety and loyalty are indoctrination tools that can be discarded.
sentences.chinese: 孝与忠在隋文帝心目中是可以抛弃的教化工具。

sentences.english: Ruling Sui Dynasty by filial piety had positive and negative influence.
sentences.chinese: 隋文帝“孝理天下”具有一定的正面与负面影响。
